always be by Lord Rance's side,"},{"lineNumber":128244,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうしたらいいのか分からないけど……","translatedEnglishLine":" I don't know what I should do..."},{"lineNumber":128245,"originalJapaneseLine":"　頑張ろう……）","translatedEnglishLine":" I'll do my best...)"},{"lineNumber":128246,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ランス様に愛想つかされないような子になろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"(I'll become a girl whom Lord Rance won't grow tired of."},{"lineNumber":128247,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もっと、ちゃんと、立派になって……","translatedEnglishLine":" I'll become more proper and respectable..."},{"lineNumber":128248,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様の隣にいても恥ずかしくないような子に）","translatedEnglishLine":" So that I won't be embarrassed standing next to Lord Rance.)"},{"lineNumber":128249,"originalJapaneseLine":"（それで……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(And then...)"},{"lineNumber":128250,"originalJapaneseLine":"（もし、私のワガママが叶うなら……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(If my selfish wish could come true...)"},{"lineNumber":128251,"originalJapaneseLine":"（…………）","translatedEnglishLine":"(......)"},{"lineNumber":128252,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ランス様と……","translatedEnglishLine":"(With Lord Rance..."},{"lineNumber":128253,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ずぅっと一緒にいられますように……）","translatedEnglishLine":" I hope we can be together forever...)"},{"lineNumber":128254,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"......"},{"lineNumber":128255,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":128256,"originalJapaneseLine":"大陸――","translatedEnglishLine":"Continent—"},{"lineNumber":128257,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヘルマン国北部、シベリア地方――","translatedEnglishLine":"Northern part of the Kingdom of Herman, Siberian region—"},{"lineNumber":128258,"originalJapaneseLine":"巨大戦艦内部――","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside the colossal battleship—"},{"lineNumber":128259,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now then...\""},

{"lineNumber":128260,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルはミカン箱の上にノートを広げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ciel spread out her notebook on an orange crate."},

{"lineNumber":128261,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィル・プラインの日記。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ciel Prine's diary."},

{"lineNumber":128262,"originalJapaneseLine":"LP7年　5月3日。","translatedEnglishLine":"LP Year 7, May 3rd."},

{"lineNumber":128263,"originalJapaneseLine":"私達が巨大戦艦に入ってはや十日が過ぎました。","translatedEnglishLine":"It has already been ten days since we entered the colossal battleship."},

{"lineNumber":128264,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦艦の中はとっても不思議な遺跡です。","translatedEnglishLine":"The interior of the battleship is a very mysterious ruin."},

{"lineNumber":128265,"originalJapaneseLine":"外では見ないような材質の壁に","translatedEnglishLine":"Walls made from materials not seen outside,"},

{"lineNumber":128266,"originalJapaneseLine":"何に使うか分からない機械ばかり。","translatedEnglishLine":"and all kinds of machines whose purpose I don't understand."},

{"lineNumber":128267,"originalJapaneseLine":"その上、中はとっても広く、","translatedEnglishLine":"Moreover, inside is extremely spacious,"},

{"lineNumber":128268,"originalJapaneseLine":"まだまだ果ては見えません。","translatedEnglishLine":"and the end is still out of sight."},

{"lineNumber":128269,"originalJapaneseLine":"元々は聖女の子モンスターである、","translatedEnglishLine":"Originally, we came to look for Seracroras-sama,"},

{"lineNumber":128270,"originalJapaneseLine":"セラクロラス様を探しに来たのですが、","translatedEnglishLine":"a saintly young monster,"},

{"lineNumber":128271,"originalJapaneseLine":"この調子ではいつ見つかるか……","translatedEnglishLine":"but at this rate, I have no idea when we will find her..."},

{"lineNumber":128272,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ、でもその代わり、","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, but instead,"},

{"lineNumber":128273,"originalJapaneseLine":"この遺跡に暮らす種族である、","translatedEnglishLine":"I have made friends with three of the Horus,"},

{"lineNumber":128274,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホルスの方、三人とお友達になりました。","translatedEnglishLine":"a species that lives in this ruin."},

{"lineNumber":128275,"originalJapaneseLine":"最初は言葉が通じなかったのですが、","translatedEnglishLine":"At first, we couldn't understand each other's language,"},

{"lineNumber":128276,"originalJapaneseLine":"翻訳機なるもので言葉が通じるように。","translatedEnglishLine":"but thanks to a device called a translator, we were able to communicate."},

{"lineNumber":128277,"originalJapaneseLine":"すごいですね、","translatedEnglishLine":"It's amazing,"},

{"lineNumber":128278,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔法のようで魔法ではないそうです。","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems like magic, but it's not actually magic."},

{"lineNumber":128279,"originalJapaneseLine":"機械の力だそうです。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's the power of machinery."},

{"lineNumber":128280,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様がこれは面白いと、","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Rance said this was interesting,"},

{"lineNumber":128281,"originalJapaneseLine":"大はしゃぎしていました。","translatedEnglishLine":"and he was very excited about it."},

{"lineNumber":128282,"originalJapaneseLine":"私も……","translatedEnglishLine":"I also..."},

{"lineNumber":128283,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おいシィル、何を書いてる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey Ciel, what are you writing?\""},{"lineNumber":128284,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃっ！　ランス様！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kya! Lord Rance!?\""},{"lineNumber":128285,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ〜？　なになに？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah~? What is it, what is it?"},{"lineNumber":128286,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私達が巨大戦艦の中に入って……」","translatedEnglishLine":" That we entered the colossal battleship...\""},{"lineNumber":128287,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃー！　ランス様、やめ、やめて下さい〜！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaa! Lord Rance, stop, please stop~!\""},{"lineNumber":128288,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、日記か。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, a diary, huh."},{"lineNumber":128289,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前もマメだな」","translatedEnglishLine":" You're a diligent one.\""},{"lineNumber":128290,"originalJapaneseLine":"「休憩は終わりだ、行くぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Break's over, let's go.\""},{"lineNumber":128291,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、でもまだ書き終わってなくて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, but I haven't finished writing yet...\""},{"lineNumber":128292,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいたっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ouch!\""},{"lineNumber":128293,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シィル、お前は俺のなんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ciel, what are you to me?\""},{"lineNumber":128294,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐすっ……奴隷です……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sniff... a slave...\""},{"lineNumber":128295,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃあ俺様はお前のなんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then what am I to you?\""},{"lineNumber":128296,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ご、ご主人様です……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"M-my master...\""},{"lineNumber":128297,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その通り……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Exactly...\""},

{"lineNumber":128298,"originalJapaneseLine":"「奴隷はご主人様である","translatedEnglishLine":"Slaves must only obey their masters,"},

{"lineNumber":128299,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様の命令だけ聞いてればいいのだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":" and listen solely to my orders!\""},

{"lineNumber":128300,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、行くぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, let's go!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 置いていかれないよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't let myself be left behind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ずっとランス様の傍にいる為には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (In order to always be by Lord Rance's side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしたらいいのか分からないけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know what I should do...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頑張ろう……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll do my best...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ランス様に愛想つかされないような子になろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I'll become a girl whom Lord Rance won't grow tired of.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっと、ちゃんと、立派になって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll become more proper and respectable...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様の隣にいても恥ずかしくないような子に）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So that I won't be embarrassed standing next to Lord Rance.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （それで……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (And then...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （もし、私のワガママが叶うなら……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (If my selfish wish could come true...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ランス様と……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (With Lord Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずぅっと一緒にいられますように……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I hope we can be together forever...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大陸――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Continent—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン国北部、シベリア地方――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Northern part of the Kingdom of Herman, Siberian region—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大戦艦内部――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside the colossal battleship—
"Now then..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルはミカン箱の上にノートを広げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ciel spread out her notebook on an orange crate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル・プラインの日記。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ciel Prine's diary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: LP7年　5月3日。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: LP Year 7, May 3rd.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達が巨大戦艦に入ってはや十日が過ぎました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It has already been ten days since we entered the colossal battleship.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦艦の中はとっても不思議な遺跡です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The interior of the battleship is a very mysterious ruin.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 外では見ないような材質の壁に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Walls made from materials not seen outside,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何に使うか分からない機械ばかり。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and all kinds of machines whose purpose I don't understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その上、中はとっても広く、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moreover, inside is extremely spacious,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだまだ果ては見えません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the end is still out of sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元々は聖女の子モンスターである、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Originally, we came to look for Seracroras-sama,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セラクロラス様を探しに来たのですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a saintly young monster,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この調子ではいつ見つかるか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but at this rate, I have no idea when we will find her...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、でもその代わり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, but instead,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この遺跡に暮らす種族である、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have made friends with three of the Horus,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホルスの方、三人とお友達になりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a species that lives in this ruin.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初は言葉が通じなかったのですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At first, we couldn't understand each other's language,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翻訳機なるもので言葉が通じるように。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but thanks to a device called a translator, we were able to communicate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごいですね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's amazing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法のようで魔法ではないそうです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems like magic, but it's not actually magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 機械の力だそうです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the power of machinery.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様がこれは面白いと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance said this was interesting,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大はしゃぎしていました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and he was very excited about it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私も……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I also...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいシィル、何を書いてる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey Ciel, what are you writing?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃっ！　ランス様！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kya! Lord Rance!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ〜？　なになに？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah~? What is it, what is it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達が巨大戦艦の中に入って……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That we entered the colossal battleship..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃー！　ランス様、やめ、やめて下さい〜！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaa! Lord Rance, stop, please stop~!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、日記か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, a diary, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前もマメだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're a diligent one."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「休憩は終わりだ、行くぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Break's over, let's go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、でもまだ書き終わってなくて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, but I haven't finished writing yet..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいたっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ouch!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シィル、お前は俺のなんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ciel, what are you to me?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐすっ……奴隷です……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sniff... a slave..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあ俺様はお前のなんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then what am I to you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご、ご主人様です……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "M-my master..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その通り……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Exactly..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴隷はご主人様である
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Slaves must only obey their masters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の命令だけ聞いてればいいのだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and listen solely to my orders!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、行くぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, let's go!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't let myself be left behind.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (In order to always be by Lord Rance's side,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしたらいいのか分からないけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know what I should do...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頑張ろう……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll do my best...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ランス様に愛想つかされないような子になろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I'll become a girl whom Lord Rance won't grow tired of.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっと、ちゃんと、立派になって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll become more proper and respectable...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様の隣にいても恥ずかしくないような子に）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So that I won't be embarrassed standing next to Lord Rance.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （それで……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (And then...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （もし、私のワガママが叶うなら……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (If my selfish wish could come true...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ランス様と……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (With Lord Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずぅっと一緒にいられますように……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I hope we can be together forever...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大陸――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Continent—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン国北部、シベリア地方――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Northern part of the Kingdom of Herman, Siberian region—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大戦艦内部――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside the colossal battleship—
"Now then..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルはミカン箱の上にノートを広げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ciel spread out her notebook on an orange crate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル・プラインの日記。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ciel Prine's diary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: LP7年　5月3日。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: LP Year 7, May 3rd.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達が巨大戦艦に入ってはや十日が過ぎました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It has already been ten days since we entered the colossal battleship.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦艦の中はとっても不思議な遺跡です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The interior of the battleship is a very mysterious ruin.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 外では見ないような材質の壁に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Walls made from materials not seen outside,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何に使うか分からない機械ばかり。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and all kinds of machines whose purpose I don't understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その上、中はとっても広く、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moreover, inside is extremely spacious,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだまだ果ては見えません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the end is still out of sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元々は聖女の子モンスターである、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Originally, we came to look for Seracroras-sama,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セラクロラス様を探しに来たのですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a saintly young monster,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この調子ではいつ見つかるか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but at this rate, I have no idea when we will find her...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、でもその代わり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, but instead,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この遺跡に暮らす種族である、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have made friends with three of the Horus,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホルスの方、三人とお友達になりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a species that lives in this ruin.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初は言葉が通じなかったのですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At first, we couldn't understand each other's language,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翻訳機なるもので言葉が通じるように。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but thanks to a device called a translator, we were able to communicate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごいですね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's amazing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法のようで魔法ではないそうです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems like magic, but it's not actually magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 機械の力だそうです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the power of machinery.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様がこれは面白いと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance said this was interesting,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大はしゃぎしていました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and he was very excited about it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私も……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I also...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいシィル、何を書いてる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey Ciel, what are you writing?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃっ！　ランス様！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kya! Lord Rance!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ〜？　なになに？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah~? What is it, what is it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達が巨大戦艦の中に入って……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That we entered the colossal battleship..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃー！　ランス様、やめ、やめて下さい〜！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaa! Lord Rance, stop, please stop~!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、日記か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, a diary, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前もマメだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're a diligent one."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「休憩は終わりだ、行くぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Break's over, let's go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、でもまだ書き終わってなくて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, but I haven't finished writing yet..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいたっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ouch!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シィル、お前は俺のなんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ciel, what are you to me?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐすっ……奴隷です……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sniff... a slave..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあ俺様はお前のなんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then what am I to you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご、ご主人様です……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "M-my master..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その通り……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Exactly..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴隷はご主人様である
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Slaves must only obey their masters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の命令だけ聞いてればいいのだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and listen solely to my orders!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、行くぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, let's go!"
